mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.area_id AS "area.id", a.name AS "name", a.price AS "price", a.in_date AS "inDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u2.name AS "user.name", o3.name AS "office.name", a4.name AS "area.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_book( id, user_id, office_id, area_id, name, price, in_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{office.id}, #{area.id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{inDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_book SET user_id = #{user.id}, office_id = #{office.id}, area_id = #{area.id}, name = #{name}, price = #{price}, in_date = #{inDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
